DOC.brief_summary: This study validation study document acceptability revise Plasticity-based Adaptive Cognitive Remediation ( PACR ) program patient HIV-associated Neurocognitive Dysfunction ( HAND ) . The primary objective study evaluate effect revise PACR program cognitive ability ( e.g. , attention , executive function ) , functional status quality life individual diagnose HAND . The secondary objective study collect relevant data support pre-investigational device exemption ( IDE ) submission FDA require pivotal randomize , control trial plan Phase II .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Participant 2560 year age 2 . Participant HIV positive 3 . Participant diagnosis HIVassociated neurocognitive disorder ( HAND ) , Mild Neurocognitive Disorder ( MND ) HIV associate dementia ( HAD ) 4 . Participant fluent English 5 . Participant able use iPad access wireless internet connection 6 . Participant history condition ( HAND ) , include mental illness , cancer , neurological condition ( multiple sclerosis , seizure disorder ) 7 . Participant enrol another research study 8 . Participant current significant past history substance abuse 9 . Participant severe depression chronic psychiatric disorder ( eg . Schizophrenia Bipolar Disorder )
